title: F1DB
description: F1DB Races Race Results JSON Schema

round.description: The round number of the race in the season.

positionDisplayOrder.description: The display order of the driver's position in the race.

positionNumber.description: The numerical finishing position of the driver in the race.

positionText.description: The textual representation of the driver's finishing position in the race.

driverNumber.description: The car number of the driver.

engineManufacturerId.description: The identifier of the engine manufacturer.

tyreManufacturerId.description: The identifier of the tyre manufacturer.

sharedCar.description: Whether the driver shared the car with another driver.

laps.description: The total number of laps completed by the driver.

time.description: The race time recorded for the driver.

timePenalty.description: The time penalty imposed on the driver.

gap.description: The gap between the driver and the leader.

gapLaps.description: The gap measured in laps between the driver and the leader.

interval.description: The interval between the driver and the car ahead.

reasonRetired.description: The reason for the driver's retirement from the race, if applicable.

points.description: The points awarded to the driver for the race.

qualificationPositionNumber.description: The numerical position achieved in the qualification session.

qualificationPositionText.description: The textual representation of the qualification position, including special statuses.

gridPositionText.description: The textual representation of the starting grid position, including special statuses.

positionsGained.description: The number of positions gained by the driver during the race.

pitStops.description: The total number of pit stops made by the driver during the race.

fastestLap.description: Whether the driver set the fastest lap during the race.

driverOfTheDay.description: Whether the driver was voted Driver of the Day.

grandSlam.description: Whether the driver achieved a Grand Slam, defined as pole position, fastest lap, and leading every lap of the race.
